✔️ rebuilding our crumbling infrastructure
✔️ making college tuition-free
✔️ making healthcare a right
✔️ guaranteeing paid family and sick leave

Dear Tim Sloan: @WellsFargo is getting sanctioned by regulators left and right. You already made 291x more than your average employee. Now you’re getting a $4.6 million raise and want praise because you’re not getting a bonus on top? You should be fired, not rewarded. https://twitter.com/reuters/status/974387314167336961 QT @Reuters Wells Fargo CEO defends pay; calls U.S. Senator Warren's criticism 'inappropriate' http://www.reuters.com/article/us-wells-fargo-ceo/wells-fargo-ceo-defends-pay-calls-u-s-senator-warrens-criticism-inappropriate-idUSKCN1GR34J?utm_campaign=trueAnthem:+Trending+Content&utm_content=5aaadc7a04d30127116b2844&utm_medium=trueAnthem&utm_source=twitter http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DYW4GQcWAAAHhYz.jpg
